altername_name: USAプロバスケットボール
name: Takin' it to the Hoop
overview: You're a high scoring point guard capable of awesome vertical leaps and hangtime. Matter of fact, you can do it all! Dribble. Bouncepass. Fake. Pivot. Jump. Shoot. Play man or zone. Drive the lane and the graphics go MEGA! Is your defender all over you? Give him a move and JAM SLAM IN YOUR FACE! Eight US teams. Play Tournament, League of Exhibition. Lace up those hightops and go for it.
